array.name: walkthrough_title
array.item: Get your photos in one tap!
Set group settings based on your needs

array.name: walkthrough_desc
array.item: Share pictures with friends and family without clogging your gallery. Find your event photos instantly!
Don\'t worry about losing data.\n Store all photos in encrypted aws s3 buckets for free. Manage personal gallery and shared group albums using SOTA Face Recognition
Select who can upload. Choose if users can see all photos or just their own. Select people whose photos you want to auto-sync to your phone galley.
